author: parithosh
content: There isn't a public one right now, But I can DM a private one to you

author: parithosh
content:
We've updated the kintsugi config files to include the renaming from `MERGE` to `BELLATRIX`, the new kintsugi config can be found here: https://github.com/eth-clients/merge-testnets/blob/main/kintsugi/config.yaml#L24

This change just affects CL clients, all clients have either merged renaming related changes into their unstable branches or into the kintsugi PR. Some clients even ship with a `--kintsugi` flag to make things easier ðŸ™‚

When in doubt, refer to this doc for which version is compatible: https://notes.ethereum.org/BTKyjy_GSlebktLQfVN2zg?view

Trying to use the older configs with a newer version of the client will lead to errors.

author: diegolosada
content: Works for Teku (was struggling with the BELLATRIX error). Thanks!

author: ajsutton
content: I'd recommend `--network kintsugi` with Teku - we have the config built in now. ðŸ™‚
